If you are searching for a high-quality spacious home with excellent connectivity this sector situated right off the Dwarka Expressway is the ideal choice. We specialize in curating verified listings that meet diverse needs ensuring you find a rental property that truly feels like home.

Browse through our comprehensive listings to rent house in Sector 114 whether you require a compact 2 BHK independent unit or a sprawling 4 BHK villa. This locality promises a balanced lifestyle combining peaceful residential pockets with fast access to major commercial hubs like Gurgaon and central Gurgaon. Start your stress-free house hunting journey today with our expert guidance and real-time availability updates.

featuresSection.heading: Exploring Diverse Rental House Configurations in Sector 114 Gurgaon for Every Family Need
description: Sector 114 offers a robust inventory of rental properties catering to singles couples small families and large joint families. Understanding the configuration is key to choosing the right home and our listings cover everything from compact builder floors to expansive luxurious villas. We help you filter options based on size amenities and preferred lifestyle.

Finding the best rent house in Sector 114 means assessing space utility and privacy needs. Whether you prioritize green spaces or direct access to the main road our portfolio of properties guarantees quality construction and vetted ownership for a seamless rental experience.

features.title: 2 BHK Independent House Options
features.description: Ideal for young professionals couples or small nuclear families these 2 BHK independent houses offer privacy and sufficient living space. Typically featuring modern fittings modular kitchens and dedicated parking they provide excellent value. Searching for a quality rent house in Sector 114 often starts here balancing affordability with independent living advantages.

features.title: 3 BHK Builder Floor Apartments
features.description: Builder floors are extremely popular in Sector 114 Gurgaon offering spacious layouts and low-density living compared to high-rise apartments. A 3 BHK builder floor provides large bedrooms ample storage and sometimes exclusive terrace or balcony access. These units are perfect for families requiring extra space without compromising on location or modern amenities.

features.title: Luxury Duplex and Villa Rentals
features.description: For those seeking premium living duplexes and villas in Sector 114 provide unparalleled luxury and scale. These homes often come fully furnished or semi-furnished with high-end finishes private gardens and multiple floors offering segmented living zones. Rent house in Sector 114 options in this category are highly sought after for their exclusivity and lifestyle upgrade.

features.title: Fully Furnished Rental Homes
features.description: If you prioritize move-in readiness our selection of fully furnished houses eliminates the hassle of moving furniture. These homes come equipped with essential appliances furniture and often aesthetic interior design making them perfect for expats or corporate relocations. This is the fastest way to secure a comfortable and immediate rental setup in a prime location.

features.title: Semi-Furnished Rental Units
features.description: Semi-furnished houses provide the best of both worlds offering fitted wardrobes modular kitchens and sometimes air conditioning while allowing tenants to personalize the space with their own furniture. This configuration is widely available across Sector 114 providing flexibility and reducing initial moving costs significantly.

features.title: Ground Floor Rental Availability
features.description: Ground floor rentals are excellent for families with elderly members or those who prefer easy access without relying on lifts. These units often feature private entrances or small front yards adding to their appeal. We list various independent houses where the ground floor is available offering convenience and accessibility across Sector 114 Gurgaon.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting a House in Sector 114 Gurgaon and Rental Agreements
faqSection.description: Get clear answers to the most common questions prospective tenants ask about securing a house for rent in Sector 114 including lease terms security deposits and documentation requirements.

faqs.question: What is the typical security deposit required to rent house in Sector 114 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit in Sector 114 typically ranges between one to three months worth of rent depending on the property type furnishing level and the landlord's preference. For highly demanded or fully furnished luxury properties the deposit might lean towards the higher end. This deposit is refundable at the end of the tenancy period subject to no damages being incurred to the property beyond normal wear and tear and full payment of utility bills.

faqs.question: Are independent houses available for rent to bachelors or only families in Sector 114
faqs.answer: Sector 114 is generally open to renting properties to both bachelors and families although individual landlords may have specific preferences. Builder floors often accommodate working professionals and bachelors while larger independent houses or villas are typically favored by families. We recommend clearly specifying your tenant profile when searching so we can match you with landlord-friendly listings.

faqs.question: How long is the standard lease agreement duration for rentals in Sector 114
faqs.answer: The most common lease agreement duration for residential rentals in Sector 114 is 11 months which is then renewable upon mutual agreement. Some landlords may offer 12-month agreements or longer leases up to 2 or 3 years especially for corporate leases or high-value tenants. All agreements include clauses regarding rent escalation and notice periods for vacating the property.

faqs.question: What is the average rent price range for a 3 BHK independent house in this sector
faqs.answer: The rent for a 3 BHK independent house in Sector 114 varies significantly based on its size age and level of furnishing. Generally the range starts from approximately INR 25000 per month for a basic semi-furnished builder floor and can go up to INR 45000 or more for a premium newly constructed or fully furnished unit with excellent fittings and amenities.

faqs.question: Is Sector 114 Gurgaon well connected by public transport options
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 114 offers excellent connectivity. While it is primarily served by major roads like the Dwarka Expressway and National Highway 48 it has strong access to nearby public transport. The Dwarka Sector 21 Metro Station is a short drive away and various local buses and shared auto services ensure easy commutation within Gurgaon and across the border to Gurgaon.

faqs.question: What documents are required from tenants to finalize a rental agreement
faqs.answer: To finalize the agreement tenants typically need to provide valid identity proof such as Aadhar Card or Passport current address proof proof of employment or income sometimes bank statements and two recent passport-sized photographs. NRI tenants may require additional documentation like VISA copies and power of attorney if signing remotely.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed in rental houses in Sector 114
faqs.answer: The policy on pets is strictly at the discretion of the individual landlord when you rent house in Sector 114. Many independent house owners are more lenient about pets compared to apartment societies but it is crucial to clarify this upfront. We highly advise discussing any pet ownership before signing the lease to ensure compliance and avoid future conflicts.

faqs.question: Who is responsible for the maintenance and repair costs of the house
faqs.answer: Generally routine minor maintenance like light bulb replacement or basic plumbing fixes are the tenant's responsibility. Major structural repairs or issues related to the building's infrastructure like waterproofing or wiring faults are the responsibility of the landlord. These responsibilities are clearly defined in the maintenance clause of the rental agreement.

faqs.question: Can I negotiate the rent price listed for a property in Sector 114
faqs.answer: Yes negotiation is often possible especially if you are committing to a longer lease term or are a very strong tenant profile. While landlords set a base price there is usually a small margin for negotiation. Our agents are skilled at mediating these discussions to ensure both parties reach a fair and mutually beneficial rental rate.

faqs.question: What utility charges am I responsible for as a tenant in an independent house
faqs.answer: As a tenant in an independent house you are typically responsible for 100% of your usage charges including electricity water gas if applicable and any internet or cable bills. The meter readings are usually taken separately for the rented unit ensuring fair billing based solely on your consumption.
